resources.string: You are a badass, a skyscrapper is built by placing one brick a day - Victor Gomes

This app is suppose to help people track their morning routine. Upon selecting complete on the main screen the app will save what the user has accomplished and will store this information along with the user\'s photo in storage. It also allows a user to add additional tasks as they wish to storage and will preserve their routine for every morning. It will then transfer the user to a congratulations page which will grab a new motivational quote each day and present the user with their weekly statistics. The stats page will display the users progress in their morning ritual for an entire month, a date selector will also be available so users can select specific days and see their photograph for that day and what they have accomplished.
